title: My Speaker quit working! It works on Bluetooth, It works on Media. But when I turn Speaker phone no!
content: I have restarted it over a dozen times I've checked all of my apps my speaker phone will not work I can only hear people if the speaker phone is off or if I'm in the truck and it's Bluetooth to my vehicle. My speaker phone will not work and it's driving me nuts because I can't find an answer
